item.title: Large 1br in great area (oakland downtown) $1100 1bd
item.description:
We have a very nice and very large 1br for rent around Adam's Point (Between Downtown Oakland, Lake Merritt, and Piedmont-walking distance to each). Address is 155 Pearl St. It is in a secure, quiet complex; unit has a good size balcony with storage room, a large courtyard (that no one else uses because the only door is right next to this unit), and a parking spot in a secure garage. Washers/Dryers on premises as well. 5 minute walk to Whole Foods, 10 minute walk to Lake Merritt, 10 minute walk to Piedmont Downtown and Grand/Lake area, 15-20 minute walk to 19th st BART and Downtown Oakland, easy close access to 580 freeway. Pictures available upon request, just be aware we are in the process of moving out so they may seem slightly cluttered.

Please contact with any Questions; Move in is March 1st

155 Pearl St (google map) (yahoo map)

item.title: Charming Country Cottage in Penngrove! (rohnert pk / cotati) $1100 1bd
item.description:
This darling little house on a big country lot has all the trimmings!

Cottage in the country, with 1 bedroom plus laundry/extra room, and a fenced yard. The laundry room is a complete extra room connected to the bedroom, with a back door into it. It can be used as a home office. Refrigerator included but not a washer or dryer.

This property is 2 acres, but it has several other rentals on it. There are two other residential rentals, and several commercial rentals. The commercial rentals are very low key, with very nice friendly tenants, who aren't there at night. The two other residential rentals are at the other end of the property.

Looking for LONG-TERM tenant. Must have GOOD CREDIT. Pets welcomed with pet deposit.

$1,100 Security deposit & 1st month's rent at move-in.

Call Colleen at 415-453-3161 to arrange a showing.

item.title: Kensington garden flat (berkeley north / hills) $1900 2bd 1200sqft
item.description:
Sit on your very private deck a few feet above the large, green backyard in this 2-bedroom, 1 bath older Kensington house.

Large frontroom; Good sized bedroom lets out through French doors onto nice deck a few feet above large, green backyard (shared with upper house).
Less than a block from the Express Trans-Bay bus and shopping.

Second bedroom smaller, with raised nook for sleeping quarters; good storage, includes part of garage for storage, although not for parking. Wonderful, large, fenced-in backyard.
Bathrooom has shower and tub.

Pets negotiable.

First, last, and a $2000 deposit.

item.title: Newly Remodeled-hrdwood-El Cerrito (albany / el cerrito) $1450 2bd 830sqft
item.description:
* People with the mindset of contributing to the world to make it a better place are welcome! :)
* Upper unit in 4-plex across from Del Norte Bart Station
* Excellent neighbors; all pet friendly and professional
* Available February 16th; one year lease required
* Pics show furniture, but will be rented unfurnished
* Building (exterior) freshly painted; soft green tea with off-white accents
* Hard wood floors- newly finished
* Fresh paint (soft yellow/off-white feel)
* Fireplace- decorative (cannot use)
* Private Patio and Yard, gated-you maintain and change as you like; gardners welcome
* Garage access for storage (yay!)
* Driveway parking; so off street parking
* Laundry facilities
* Cats okay
* Dogs okay, but no yappers/yelpers and no pitbulls (unless has certificate for Good Citizen Canine and willing to attain renters insurance, which is always advisable anyway)
* Right across from the Del Norte El Cerrito Bart Station (this can be a real positive for commuters; trains going at slow speeds at station, so that is good)
* Recent credit issues such as a bankruptcy or foreclosure or short sale is not an issue
* Move-in ready now: $1800 Security and 1st month's rent of $1450
* Water included
* Garbage included
* Square footage around 832

Perfect for professionals, students, small family.

The unit has a real homey feel. It's like a nice treehouse as it is located at the backside of complex, 2nd story, and private backyard with trees, thus the treehouse feel.

Location is part of the Madera Elementary School district.
Here's info on the Madera Elementary School too. It is very reputable.

* API Scores:
http://api.cde.ca.gov/AcntRpt2009/2009GrowthSch.aspx?allcds=07617966004840
* Link to Madera Elementary School:
http://www.wccusd.k12.ca.us/madera/main/about.htm
* School Locator (boundaries) West Contra Costa School District:
http://www.schoolsiteonline.com/schoolsitelocator/?districtCode=32073

Please call Alex for a showing. I look forward to talking with you. :)

Alex: 510-301-6878


6409-6415 Knott Ave (google map) (yahoo map)

item.title: ██Spacious, HW flrs, bathtub, Vintage-Victorian, Ground floor! (Point Richmond near DT, San Rafael) $1000 1bd 750sqft
item.description:
2 blocks from charming downtown Point Richmond,Original HW floors/Pergo quiet upscale residential, most utilities included., full bathtub.


For non-smokers only, located 2 blocks from downtown Point Richmond with access to restaurants, shopping, public library, post office, banks etc. Features a living room & eat-in kitchen with attached 'expandable' dinning room, two large counters, some 15 cabinet door cupboard with a rotating 'carousel' storage for pots & pans, original hardwood floors maple satin finished. Lots of cupboard/closets space, full size gas with electric ignition oven/stove, full size refrigerator. Two large closets with built in shelves, cabinet and additional shelving, ceiling fan and two entrances.The bathroom has a tiled shower over a full size tub.



located 2 blocks from downtown Point Richmond. Quiet, upscale residential neighborhood. A short walk to restaurants, shopping, public library, post office, banks etc.



Cold and hot water, and garbage are included (tenant pays for electricity only). A large community back yard/deck with a little garden which gets afternoon sun; a good place for sun-bathing and barbecuing. On-site laundry facility and ample street parking are available. Walking distance to a nice Marina, two parks, beautiful swimming beach. Historic Point Richmond is known for having lots of hiking trails with one of the most magnificent viewpoints of the Bay Area.



A few minutes drive from Berkeley . . .The unit has good accessibility to the East Bay, San Francisco and the North Bay with minutes to BART Bay Bridge, HWs 80, 580, 101, Richmond/San Rafael Bridge and Richmond Ferry Terminal.



The area is considered an upscale quite residential neighborhood. To view pictures: http://www.flickr.com/photos/garyluria/ and look for APT #8.




Directions from Berkeley: Take Richmond Parkway exit; veer to the right; make left to Castro St; another left at the second light still on Castro street; drive straight w/Castro up the hill for about 50 yards or so and turn left to W Richmond Ave. for about 50 yards or so and park at Martina St.
Please call Gary at (510) 688-8018 or 510-317-5880 or e-mail back.

It is move-in ready and at this great price it will not last long! Pennsylvania Apartments also features a sparkling pool, 2 laundry facilities, a dog run park and BBQ area for the exclusive use of our residents only! Call today to schedule a personal tour!
Pennsylvania Apartments | Aeris Properties | ereed@aerisproperties.com | (510) 792-2328
3600 Pennsylvania Ave, Fremont, CA

Welcome to Pennsylvania Apartments! Come see our gorgeous 1 bedroom, 1 bath apartment home. It features a large living room and entertainment area, spacious kitchen with roomy cabinets to accommodate all your necessities, generous storage, ceiling fans and a dog park on property for your family pet!

Enjoy the lush landscaping, sprawling trees and greenery surrounding the complex. Our units come equipped with either a balcony, patio or large backyards. Relax in the privacy of your outdoor living space and enjoy this crisp Fall weather.

Call us to schedule your tour TODAY! We look forward to welcoming you into your new apartment home with us at Pennsylvania Apartments!

item.title: 2 bedroom upstairs apt. (san jose west) $1300 2bd 560sqft
item.description:
Im trying to find someone to take over my lease on my 2 bedroom 1 bath apartment on the border of San Jose and Cupertino. This upstairs apartment is approximately 560 sq ft with a good size kitchen and dining area. The apartment comes with one assigned shared garage space with another parking space outside the garage door. There is a nice small courtyard for barbequing and enjoying the good days. Prospect High School is located directly across the street with a beautiful lighted track and football field for all to use and the Los Gatos Creek Trail entrance is 3 minutes walking distance from the apartment.Additionally Westgate Mall, Target and Trader Joes are all within a mile of the apartment and Highway 85 and 280 are within 5 minutes drive time. This is a small complex with only 15 units and everybody is very friendly. There is a laundry room downstairs with 2 washers and 4 dryers coin operated. I need someone to move in immediately to and sign a lease through 5/31 at which point they can then choose to re sign the lease for the next year or leave if they like. Once you move in, I will no longer have anything to do with the property and it will be between you and the landlord. I run a janitorial company so the apartment will be professionally cleaned and the carpet will be cleaned as well. If you're interested, please contact me now so I can get you in as soon as possible and so I wont miss out on the opportunity for my next living situation. Pictures upon request. Thanks for your time.

Update: I neglected to mention that there is a $1200 deposit for the apartment and the prorated rent if you were to move in before the 1st of March would be based on number of days remaining in the month.

Prospect road at Lawrence Expwy (google map) (yahoo map)

We offer 58 1-bedroom apartments designed for a senior lifestyle.
Amenities include:

Full kitchen with gas stove & microwave, walk-in closets, patio or balconies, we pay hot water & garbage. Ceiling fans in bedroom and dinning area, elevator, emergency call system, on site laundry room and 24-hour maintenance service.

In the neighborhood: Lake Elizabeth and Fremont Senior Center which offers daily lunch and activities (for a small fee). Fremont Hub, Safeway, Banks, Kaiser and Washington Hospital.

On a nice day enjoy our large community patio and sit among mature trees at this peaceful garden setting community. Socialize in the beautifully decorated and comfortable community center; play bingo on Tuesday or enjoy a good home cooked meal on select holidays.

If some quiet time is what you require, retreat to our multimedia room and watch a movie or read your favorite novel or catch up on current events from your newspaper.

*Security Deposit $500.00 on approved application & credit/criminal check, additional deposit may be required. See Community Administrator for details.

Small pets are welcome with a $400.00 Pet deposit
Apartments are approximately 575 sq. ft.

OFFICE HOURS ARE:
Monday & Wednesday 8:30 -- 12:00
Tuesday, Thursday & Friday -- 8:00-12:00 -- 1:00-5:00
Closed Saturday and Sundays

Please call (510) 226-1102 for more information and don't forget to mention you seen this ad on Craigslist!

Chapel Corner Senior Apartments accepts Section 8.


see additional photos below
RENTAL FEATURES
- Air conditioning - Walk-in closet - Living room
- Bonus/Rec room - Refrigerator - Stove/Oven
- Microwave - Balcony, Deck, or Patio - Cable-ready

COMMUNITY FEATURES
- Guest parking - Laundry on-site


LEASE TERMS
9 or 12 months

There is a living room/dining combo with an open kitchen with granite counters, gas stove, microwave and refrigerator. Good sized bedroom with one large closet. Lovely tiled full bath with jacuzzi tub and shower.

Located near Tower Market shopping center and close to many major transportation lines - #37, #48, #52, short walk to Forest Hills Station.

item.title: Large 3 Bd/2.5 Ba Bennett Valley Home w/Free Water (santa rosa) $1650 3bd
item.description:
Huge 3 bd/2.5 bath townhouse-style duplex in desirable Bennett Valley!

Features:
Attached 2 car garage, & off street parking
Central heat & AC, Fireplace
Large, private backyard. Also another patio off of dining room
Lots of storage & closet space throughout
Laundry room with washer/dryer hookups

Free water! Water/sewer bill paid for by owner
Approximately 1350-1375 sq ft
Desirable location on quiet street (Tachevah Dr) in an excellent school district

Close to shopping, public transportation, Galvin Park (which has a nice dog park) & Bennett Valley Golf Course, & freeway access
You can also walk to CVS, Safeway, or to one of the many great restaurants nearby

This home was thoroughly & professionally redone! Remodeled a few years ago: kitchen, fridge, dishwasher, bathrooms, etc.

We expect to have it move-in ready in mid-February. Email request to see more photos.

Rent is $1650 (includes water & sewer)
Security Deposit: $1850
A small to mid-size dog or cat allowed with increase in monthly rent by $50/pet/mo, and increased deposit. Or, large increase in deposit and little increase in rent.

Our wish is that you leave the home in good condition and get your whole security deposit back.

Please reply to this email if interested, and include the following information:
- timeframe for moving, with earliest possible move-in date
- # of people
- any pets? How many, what age, and what breed?
- income and employment (we especially need to know if you meet our minimum income requirements of between 2.2-3 times the rent)
- Email, phone #, and the best way to reach you
- When are you available to view the home?

item.title: Beautifully Remodeled, Spacious in a Good Location with Carport (vallejo / benicia) $890 1bd
item.description:
This is a really nice, very large flat in a charming 1930's Mediterranean (4 plex) style building in the downtown Vallejo district. This remodeled large downstairs unit consists of one bedroom, one bath, dining room, living room, extra room for storage and a beautiful kitchen.

Features:
Brand new kitchen with all new appliances and cabinetry
Brand new dishwasher, gas stove, microwave and refrigerator all energy efficient
Granite counter tops
Brand new bathroom with beautiful designer tiles & fresh paint in all rooms
Refinished hard wood floor
High ceilings with lots of window and light and ceiling fans
6 rooms (bedroom, bathroom with tub and shower, dining room, living room, extra storage and spacious kitchen)
950 square feet of space with lots of storage
One carport
Quiet neighborhood
Two miles to the Vallejo Ferry, easy Freeway access and one block away from the park
Rent includes water and carport
Pets are okay with $45 pet rent
Non-smoker & one year lease minimum (looking for a long term tenant)
Available now
Address is 1014 Marin St

Call for an appointment: (925) 323-3917
